title: MONDAY - Week 8 recap 2020
itunes:title: MONDAY - Week 8 recap 2020
description:
It wasn't pretty, but Carson Wentz (0:05) was able to lead the Eagles to a win over the Cowboys to put Philly in first place in the NFC East. Hear what Wentz had to say about the win (0:35) As for the other team in Pennsylvania, (1:01) the Steelers remain unbeaten on the season with a big win over division rival Baltimore. Seahawks quarterback Russell Wilson (2:30) tosses four more touchdowns in the win over the 49ers, while San Francisco (3:00) may have suffered a couple big losses on the offensive side of the ball. In Miami (3:27), rookie QB Tua Tagovailoa captures his first win as a starter thanks to some help from his defense and special teams.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
